item.title: U.S. and EU flesh out trade commitments under new framework deal
item.description: The U.S. and European Union said they have formalized a deal aimed at rebalancing their trade relationship.

item.title: Ukraine says huge Russian attack proves Putin uninterested in peace
item.description: As Trump pushes for peace, Ukraine accuses Russia of a deadly drone and missile strike, "as if there were no efforts by the world to stop this war."

item.title: Serena Williams reveals she's using weight loss drugs and addresses stigma
item.description: Tennis legend Serena Williams is sharing her journey with weight loss drugs, saying she's lost 31 pounds in 8 months using GLP-1s.

item.title: David Begnaud remembers Rhode Island's Judge Frank Caprio
item.description: Judge Frank Caprio, the Rhode Island judge whose compassion on the bench made him a viral star of "Caught in Providence," has died at 88 after a battl...

item.title: Tennis star Daria Kasatkina embraces new life in Australia ahead of U.S. Open
item.description: Daria Kasatkina, the Russian-born tennis star who has been called the bravest player in the world, joins "CBS Mornings" to discuss her decision to def...
